inspiration.preheader: Remember when you first fell in love with Banana Republic? Let's reignite that passion.
inspiration.hero_image_description: A stylish individual confidently walking through a cityscape, embodying the Banana Republic aesthetic.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We noticed you haven't been exploring your style with us lately. Remember when you first discovered Banana Republic and the confidence it brought to your wardrobe? Let's reconnect with that feeling and explore what's new.

first.template: You've achieved {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} in style milestones with us.
first.fallback: You've achieved significant style milestones with us.

second.template: With our latest collection, you could save up to {{customer.potential_savings}} on your next purchase.
second.fallback: With our latest collection, you could save significantly on your next purchase.

nostalgia.subject_line: Your Timeless Style with Banana Republic
nostalgia.preheader: Celebrate the moments you've shared with Banana Republic and the style that never fades.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A classic Banana Republic outfit displayed in a timeless setting, evoking nostalgia.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've shared some incredible style moments together. From your first purchase to your favorite outfits, Banana Republic has been a part of your journey. Let's continue to create timeless memories.

first.template: You've been a valued member of the Banana Republic family for {{customer.relationship_value}} years.
first.fallback: You've been a valued member of the Banana Republic family for many years.

second.template: Your lifetime value with us is {{customer.lifetime_value}}, a testament to your impeccable style.
second.fallback: Your lifetime value with us is significant, a testament to your impeccable style.

social_proof.preheader: Be part of the Banana Republic community that's redefining modern fashion.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A vibrant community of stylish individuals enjoying a Banana Republic event.
social_proof.first_paragraph: Our community is thriving, and we'd love for you to be a part of it. From exclusive events to style tips, being a Banana Republic member means more than just fashion‚Äîit's a lifestyle.

first.template: You're ranked {{customer.community_rank}} in our community‚Äîkeep climbing!
first.fallback: You're highly ranked in our community‚Äîkeep climbing!

second.template: Your engagement score is {{customer.engagement_score}}, showing your active participation.
second.fallback: Your engagement score shows your active participation in our community.
